name: VaccineAdverseEventDisordersICD10CM
title: Vaccine Adverse Event (Disorders) (ICD10CM)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains diagnoses or problems that represent that the patient has a Vaccine Adverse Event regardless of the clinical presentation of the condition),(Data Element Scope: Diagnoses or problems documented in a clinical record.),(Inclusion Criteria: Vaccine Adverse Event),(Exclusion Criteria: None)
